item.title: Change Your Password
item.description: UI has an innate ability to instill a variety of emotions in users. A dashboard full of green-background rows invokes satisfaction. A single red exclamation mark icon amidst a sea of green checkmarks should draw attention to itself like a bad spy behind enemy lines and serve as a nuisance to the user like a popcorn kernel stuck in their gums. Bad passwords, old passwords, and re-used passwords SHOULD bother users.
